episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_0100_:
Hey! I am the Karate King! And these are
my disciples!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_0400_:
I can find you right away with my psychic powers,
but that’s beside the point.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_0401_0700_:
Yes. He’s the leader of the Fighting Dojo next to
Saffron City Gym.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_0402_0900_:
Hmm... Maybe not friends, exactly. More
like rivals.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1000_:
You! The Master of Psychic Pokémon! I’ve waited
forever for this. Battle me!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1100_: I already know how this battle will end...
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1300_:
We’ll show you the results of our training!
Hwaaarggh!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1600_: I... I’m crushed... My training is still not enough...
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1700_: But a loss is a loss. I admit it.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1800_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t you train
together with the Karate King?
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_1900_:
I have a feeling that if you do, good things
will happen.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2000_: That’s a great idea! Please, train with me!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2100_: If you do, I’ll give you a Tyrogue Egg!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2200_:
If you raise Tyrogue, it can evolve into one of
three different Fighting-type Pokémon.
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2300_: Will it be the hard-kicking Hitmonlee?
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2500_: Or maybe the perfectly balanced Hitmontop?
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2600_:
No matter which one you get, it’ll be a
super-strong partner!
episode_event_egg_balkie/4001_1001_2700_: All right, enough talking! It’s training time!
